channel.title: resistant on funPlantGenes

item.title: BdWRKY38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g30695 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY38 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdWRKY38 is required for the incompatible interaction of Brachypodium distachyon with the necrotrophic fungus Rhizoctonia solani.

item.title: BdWRKY44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g44270 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY44 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Demonstrated that Bd3-1, an accession of the model grass Brachypodium distachyon, is resistant to R.

item.title: CaATL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaATL1 Gene Name: AT-hook-Like gene 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The chili pepper CaATL1: an AT-hook motif-containing transcription factor implicated in defence responses against pathogens.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: Clpsk1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G016930 Gene Symbol: Clpsk1 Gene Name: Gene_name:Citrullus lanatus Phytosulfokine1 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Resistance evaluation indicated that Clpsk1 loss-of-function renderedwatermelon seedlings more resistant to infection by FON.

item.title: CsAAP2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M573860 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2A Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2A Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: DM resistance in cucumber due to CsAAP2A mutations is caused by perturbing pathogen-induced amino acid loading of infected leaves.

item.title: CsaMLO8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5M623470.1 Gene Symbol: CsaMLO8 Gene Name: MLO-like susceptibility gene8 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsaMLO8 alleles from susceptible and resistant cucumber were cloned and transformed to mlo-mutant tomato.

item.title: CsIVP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cucsa_101020.1 Gene Symbol: CsIVP Gene Name: Irregular Vasculature Patterning Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsIVP Modulates Low Nitrogen and High-Temperature Resistance in Cucumber.

item.title: CsMLO8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_5G036400 Gene Symbol: CsMLO8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The reverse mutation of CsMLO8 results in susceptibility to powdery mildew via inhibiting cell wall apposition formation and cell death in cucumber.

item.title: CsRBOH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRBOH2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Plants overexpressing CsWRKY25 were more resistant to CBC and showed higher expression of the respiratory burst oxidase homolog (RBOH) CsRBOH2, in addition to exhibiting increased RBOH activity.

item.title: CsRDR1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1a Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1a Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1b Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1b Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c1 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c2 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsWAKL08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g14540 Gene Symbol: CsWAKL08 Gene Name: Wall-associated receptor-like kinase 8 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWAKL08, a pathogen-induced wall-associated receptor-like kinase in sweet orange, confers resistance to citrus bacterial canker via ROS control and JA signaling.

item.title: CsWRKY25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsWRKY25 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Plants overexpressing CsWRKY25 were more resistant to CBC and showed higher expression of the respiratory burst oxidase homolog (RBOH) CsRBOH2, in addition to exhibiting increased RBOH activity.

item.title: Md-NBS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDC029575.23 Gene Symbol: Md-NBS Gene Name: NBS–LRR Protein Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Analysis of the expression of Md-miRLn11 and Md-NBS during the optimum invasion period in 40 apple varieties showed that the expression of Md-NBS gene in resistant varieties is higher than in susceptible varieties, with an inverse pattern for Md-miRLn11.

item.title: MdBZR1

item.title: MdCOL6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD17G1243400 Gene Symbol: MdCOL6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBZR1–MdCOL6 mediates brassinosteroid- and light-regulated anthocyanin synthesis in apple.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHDA6 Gene Name: HISTONE DEACETYLASE 6 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: histone deacetylase 6 (MdHDA6), which negatively regulates apple drought tolerance by catalyzing deacetylation on histones associated with drought-responsive genes.
